From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The stun pistol slammed into Megatron shaking him slightly, and he
seemed to have problems moving his fusion cannon arm. Through the raging
red eyes he looked at the Mutate, and began to hoover towards him, his
functioning hand gripped tightly. "I will rend your horrid body with my
bare hands." He whispered.
